title: Hartford Line & Valley Flyer: Saturday Northbound Timetable
heading: Hartford Line & Valley Flyer: Saturday Northbound
programmers_notes: Weasyprint won't make an italic version of the SpartanTT font, so don't bother to try to style CTrail the way Connecticut does
top_text:
CTrail Hartford Line trains (#64XX) are not ticketed or operated by Amtrak; CTrail tickets must be bought at the station.
CTrail tickets are valid on Amtrak Hartford Line (#4XX) and Valley Flyer routes in this timetable.
On the Valley Flyer (#488), CTrail tickets are only valid for stations from Spingfield to New Haven.
CTrail tickets are valid on Northeast Regional (#140) for stations from Springfield to New Haven except during holiday blackout periods.
CTrail tickets are never valid on the Vermonter (#54).
The CTrail Hartford Line website has full schedules for services where CTrail tickets are valid, including additional Hartford-New Haven buses.

Connecting trains are provided at New Haven by Amtrak, Metro-North, and Shore Line East, and at Springfield by Amtrak's Lake Shore Limited.
bottom_text: This timetable is not an official CTrail, CTtransit, or State of Connecticut product. It is derived from CTRail Hartford Line's GTFS data released to the public.
